reviewText:
What a really funny show. Yakov is good about bringing you into the story he is sharing that left me laughing so hard that I had stomach pains.
This is the only comedy show I have of Yakov, but I will be looking for more.
I really enjoy Yakov.  He is very funny and keeps everything clean.  I watched this my Mom and we both enjoyed it very much.  And it had a very good message to go with it!

What a really funny show. Yakov is good about bringing you into the story he is sharing that left me laughing so hard that I had stomach pains.
This is the only comedy show I have of Yakov, but I will be looking for more.
I really enjoy Yakov.  He is very funny and keeps everything clean.  I watched this my Mom and we both enjoyed it very much.  And it had a very good message to go with it!

Each of Yakov's movies have the same message....He is glad to be an American.  He reminds me, a 13th generation american, what hardships others have endured and overcame to come to and become citizens in the country.

This man is OUTSTANDING and his DVDs are wonderful collector items.  I have two of them.  This DVD is OUTSTANDING and I highly recommend this seller as the DVD arrived quickly and in excellent condition.  You will love this man just as much as I do when you see this DVD.
Every American Home Needs a Copy.
A laugh till your sides hurt funny.

I not only received this timely....it was a great joy to laugh out loud at comedy that you didn't have to ID the room first.
First class comedy...recommend it highly.
Great family fun and laughter. Safe for the whole family to watch. Lots of old school comedy as he tells his family adventure of moving to America.
Yakov has a hilarious ironic sense of humor. I would recommend this Broadway comedy performance to everyone. If you give it as a gift that person receiving it will never forget your gift.
All good.  I'm still laughing thinking about this very funny video. If you are Russian or Ukranian you will enjoy this beyond your wildest imagination.
